code:
def test_public_business_image_all(self):
        try:
            # 初始化发现页操作类（传入self即可复用所有minium对象）
            find_page = FindPage(self)

            # 链式调用公共方法，逻辑清晰
            find_page.goto_find_page()

            find_page.dynamic_popup()

            # 点击发布商务需求 button
            business_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=business_btn_tag, inner_text=business_btn_inner_text,
                                                 max_timeout=max_timeout)
            business_btn.tap()
            self.logger.info(f"点击 {business_btn_name} 成功")

            # 显式等待
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(selector=business_tab_tag, inner_text=business_tab_inner_text,
                                                    max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)

            # 显式等待
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(business_type_element, max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)

            # 随机选择一个需求分类
            business_type_list = self.page.get_elements(business_type_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            if len(business_type_list) != 11:
                self.logger.warning(f"预期11个元素，实际找到 {len(business_type_list)} 个")

            # 3. 随机选择一个元素
            random_element = random.choice(business_type_list)
            self.logger.info(f"随机选择了第 {business_type_list.index(random_element) + 1} 个标签")

            random_element.tap()

            # 显式等待
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(selector=businessPub_tab_tag, inner_text=businessPub_tab_inner_text,
                                                    max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)

            # 输入商务需求标题
            # 随机生成1-30字内容
            self.logger.info("生成随机文本内容...")
            random_title_content = random_text_generator.generate_random_text(
                min_len=1,
                max_len=30,
                chinese_ratio=0.8  # 80%中文+20%英文
            )
            self.logger.info(
                f"生成随机文本（长度：{len(random_title_content)}字）：{random_title_content[:30]}...")  # 只打印前30字避免日志过长

            # 显式等待
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(selector=business_title_tag, inner_text=business_title_placeholder,
                                                    max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)

            # 输入到标题框
            self.logger.info("向标题框输入内容...")
            input_title = self.page.get_element(selector=business_title_tag, inner_text=business_title_placeholder,
                                                max_timeout=max_timeout)
            input_title.input(random_title_content)
            self.logger.info("标题输入成功")

            # 验证输入内容是否正确
            inputted_title_text = input_title.attribute("value")
            assert inputted_title_text == [
                random_title_content], f"输入标题不一致：预期{[random_title_content]}，实际{inputted_title_text}"
            self.logger.info("输入标题验证成功")

            # 输入商务需求内容
            # 随机生成1-300字内容
            self.logger.info("生成随机文本内容...")
            random_content = random_text_generator.generate_random_text(
                min_len=1,
                max_len=300,
                chinese_ratio=0.8  # 80%中文+20%英文
            )
            self.logger.info(f"生成随机文本（长度：{len(random_content)} 字）：{random_content[:50]}...")  # 只打印前50字避免日志过长

            # 输入到商务需求输入框
            self.logger.info("向输入框输入内容...")
            input_box = self.page.get_element(f"{business_textarea_tag}[placeholder={business_textarea_placeholder}]",
                                              max_timeout=max_timeout)
            input_box.input(random_content)
            self.logger.info("文本输入成功")

            # 验证输入内容是否正确
            inputted_text = input_box.attribute("value")
            assert inputted_text == [random_content], f"输入内容不一致：预期{[random_content]}，实际{inputted_text}"
            self.logger.info("输入内容验证成功")

            # 先检查有没有选择位置
            business_address_select = self.page.element_is_exists(business_address_select_element,
                                                                   max_timeout=max_timeout)
            if not business_address_select == True:
                # 选择位置
                try:
                    # 随机选择一个位置
                    business_address_element_list = self.page.get_elements(business_address_element,
                                                                           max_timeout=max_timeout)

                    if len(business_address_element_list) != 6:
                        self.logger.warning(f"预期6个元素，实际找到 {len(business_address_element_list)} 个")

                    # 3. 随机选择一个元素
                    # 初始化重试次数
                    retry_count = 0
                    success = False
                    max_retry_times = 5  # 最大重试次数

                    # 循环重试（最多5次）
                    while retry_count <= max_retry_times:
                        try:
                            self.logger.info(f"第 {retry_count + 1} 次尝试选择位置...")

                            # 关键：正确判断当前选择的位置是否正确（需取path属性）
                            random_element = random.choice(business_address_element_list)
                            random_element_inner_text = random_element.text

                            if random_element_inner_text != "" and random_element_inner_text != "查看更多":
                                self.logger.info(f"选择位置成功：{random_element_inner_text}")
                                success = True
                                break  # 成功则退出循环
                            else:
                                self.logger.warning(f"选择位置错误：{random_element_inner_text}，需重新选择")

                        except IndexError as e:
                            self.logger.error(f"第 {retry_count + 1} 次选择失败：元素列表为空 - {str(e)}")
                        except Exception as e:
                            self.logger.error(f"第 {retry_count + 1} 次选择失败：{str(e)}")

                        # 重试次数+1，失败则短暂休眠后重试
                        retry_count += 1
                        if retry_count <= max_retry_times:
                            time.sleep(1)  # 休眠1秒避免频繁重试

                    # 最终结果判断
                    if not success:
                        error_msg = f"选择位置失败（已重试 {max_retry_times} 次）"
                        self.logger.error(error_msg)
                        raise Exception(error_msg)

                except Exception as e:
                    self.logger.error(f"选择/点击位置失败：{str(e)}", exc_info=True)
                    # 可选：截图保存错误现场
                    timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                    self.capture(f"选择位置失败_{timestamp}.png")
                    raise  # 抛出异常，终止用例（确保测试结果为失败）

            random_element.tap()

            # 选择合作区域
            business_cooperation_area_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=business_cooperation_area_tag,
                                                                  inner_text=business_cooperation_area_inner_text,
                                                                  max_timeout=max_timeout)
            business_cooperation_area_btn.tap()

            # 随机选择一个合作区域
            business_select_cooperation_area_list = self.page.get_elements(business_select_cooperation_area_element,
                                                                           max_timeout=max_timeout)
            if len(business_select_cooperation_area_list) != 32:
                self.logger.warning(f"预期32个元素，实际找到 {len(business_select_cooperation_area_list)} 个")

            # 3. 随机选择X个元素
            business_select_cooperation_area_random = random.randint(1, len(business_select_cooperation_area_list))
            random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list = []

            for i in range(business_select_cooperation_area_random):
                random_business_select_cooperation_area_element = random.choice(business_select_cooperation_area_list)
                random_business_select_cooperation_area_element.tap()

                # 如果选中了"不限区域"就重新添加到list
                if random_business_select_cooperation_area_element.text == "不限区域":
                    random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list.clear()
                else:
                    if random_business_select_cooperation_area_element.text not in random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list:
                        random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list.append(
                            random_business_select_cooperation_area_element.text)

            self.logger.info(f"随机选择了 {len(set(random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list))} 个合作区域:{random_business_select_cooperation_area_element_list}")

            # 点击保存
            business_select_cooperation_area_save_btn = self.page.get_element(
                business_select_cooperation_area_save_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            self.logger.info("成功定位到目标弹窗内的保存按钮")

            business_select_cooperation_area_save_btn.tap()

            # 选择有效时间
            business_valid_time_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=business_valid_time_tag,
                                                            inner_text=business_valid_time_inner_text,
                                                            max_timeout=max_timeout)
            business_valid_time_btn.tap()

            # 随机选择一个有效时间
            business_select_valid_time_element_list = self.page.get_elements(business_select_valid_time_element,
                                                                             max_timeout=max_timeout)
            if len(business_select_valid_time_element_list) != 4:
                self.logger.warning(f"预期4个元素，实际找到 {len(business_select_valid_time_element_list)} 个")

            # 3. 随机选择1个元素
            random_business_select_valid_time_element = random.choice(business_select_valid_time_element_list)
            random_business_select_valid_time_element.tap()

            self.logger.info(f"随机选择了有效时间：{random_business_select_valid_time_element.text}")

            # 点击保存
            business_select_cooperation_area_save_btn = self.page.get_element(business_select_valid_time_save_element,
                                                                              max_timeout=max_timeout)
            business_select_cooperation_area_save_btn.tap()

            # 上传图片
            # 随机上传X张图片
            choose_count = random.randint(1, 9)

            # 1. 获取mock图片数据（选3张，传None则随机1-9张）
            mock_items = get_mock_image_items(choose_count=choose_count)

            # 2. 核心：调用minium原生mock方法（自动拦截chooseImage/chooseMedia/takePhoto）
            self.app.mock_choose_images(items=mock_items)

            image_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=dynamic_image_btn_tag, inner_text=dynamic_image_btn_inner_text,
                                              max_timeout=max_timeout)
            image_btn.tap()

            # 避免等待时间不足，上传失败
            sleep = 3 * choose_count
            time.sleep(sleep)

            # 添加link
            link_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=dynamic_link_tag, inner_text=dynamic_link_inner_text,
                                             max_timeout=max_timeout)
            link_btn.tap()

            # 添加link内容
            self.logger.info("向输入框输入内容...")
            link_input_box = self.page.get_element(dynamic_link_input_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            link_input_box.input(link_content)
            self.logger.info("文本输入成功")

            # 点击添加
            link_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=dynamic_link_add_tag, inner_text=dynamic_link_add_inner_text,
                                             max_timeout=max_timeout)
            link_btn.tap()

            # 避免等待时间不足，添加失败
            time.sleep(3)

            # 确认link已添加成功
            self.page.element_is_exists(selector=dynamic_link_added_tag, inner_text=dynamic_link_added_inner_text,
                                        max_timeout=max_timeout)

            timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
            self.capture(f"已输入全部商务供需内容_{timestamp}.png", region=self.page)

            # 点击发布
            public_dynamic_btn = self.page.get_element(selector=dynamic_public_tag,
                                                       inner_text=dynamic_public_inner_text, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            # public_dynamic_btn.tap()
            #
            # time.sleep(3)
            #
            # # 判断是否跳转回发现页
            # assert self.app.current_page == find_page_url, f"发布商务供需失败"

            timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
            self.capture(f"发布商务供需后_{timestamp}.png", region=self.page)

        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"发布商务需求失败：{str(e)}")
            # 异常时截图
            timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
            self.capture(f"发布商务需求失败_{timestamp}.png")
            raise

        time.sleep(3)
